Allright, that's crap. Darkmouse was in the base since it got there, 
and Tarantulus was never given the codes in the very beginning.

::Darkmouse/Killfest::

Darkmouse gives an exclamation as she sees the lockdown lifted, 
tapping furioustly and taking back control of the computers. The 
lockdown resumes.

"Can you shut down all the computers other than this one?" Killfest 
asks her.

"Yeah," she replies, "But they can turn them on."

"Destroy them then."

Darkmouse taps a few buttons, every computer except for the one in 
Killfest's room blowing up with small explosions. Only a little of 
the exaust gas gets out before the engines re-lockdown, this time 
with no computers in there.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Tarantulas quickly unscrambles the codes. What did killfest 
think he 
> was doing? This was thier ship, their home, they knew all the codes 
and all 
> the tricks to this vessle. 
>        "Begin to flood the exhaust. At any rate it will keep them 
locked in 
> the bridge." Megatron ordered. The lock down Killfest ordered was 
deleted, by 
> Tarantulas. 
>        Quickly, toxic green gas began to fill the ships corridors, 
labs, 
> rooms, brig, and every other nook and crany. Killfest was going to 
have to do 
> better than that.
